message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split is fair and benefits us both.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's find a more balanced split. This is my counter-offer.
Bob, time is literally money! This offer gives us both a good deal while we still have a good deal to split.
Alice, we need to reach an agreement soon. This is my final offer.  It is a reasonable split considering the time pressure on your end.
